The goal of qbgbaExtraData is to provide several datasets that can be used in conjunction with the data from the "Qualitaetsberichte der Krankenhaeuser", which are puplished by the "Gemeinsamer Bundesausschuss" (GBA) on a yearly basis.


## Installation

You can install qbgbaExtraData from [Gitlab](https://gitlab.com/klinik-db/qbgbaExtraData) with:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_gitlab("klinik-db/qbgbaExtraData")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r}
library(qbgbaExtraData)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))

data(populationGermany)

populationGermany %>% 
    group_by(year) %>% 
    summarize(Population = sum(count))

```
